thread.section_title: Saatchi Art Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Saatchi Art | saatchiart.com | 3 of 52
thread.title: Mitch Forman
thread.title_full: Saatchi Art reviewed by Mitch Forman

author: Mitch Forman
title: Mitch Forman
text: I received painting in good time considering the distance it had to travel. However, I sent an email just TWO days late to request a return, and was completely turned down because I'd passed the 7-day return deadline. I had no idea that 2 days would be such a huge violation; the time allowed to judge a painting you've never seen in real before receiving is too short- especially considering the four-figure prices of most works. My opinion is they purposely restrict it in order to give themselves advantage over the buyer - not exactly equitable when dealing in items as subjective as art!!!
